title: Text Preprocessing
author: Ankit Mahajan
description:
This Python code preprocesses text data in a CSV file by converting text to lowercase, removing numbers and punctuation, tokenizing the text into words, removing stopwords, and saving the preprocessed data back to a new CSV file.

Make sure to replace 'your_dataset.csv' with your CSV file's path and 'text' with the column name containing the text data. Install pandas and nltk libraries before running the code using pip install pandas nltk.
